title:
A Note on Estimation Error Bound and Grouping Effect of Transfer Elastic
  Net
abstract:
The Transfer Elastic Net is an estimation method for linear regression models
that combines $\ell_1$ and $\ell_2$ norm penalties to facilitate knowledge
transfer. In this study, we derive a non-asymptotic $\ell_2$ norm estimation
error bound for the estimator and discuss scenarios where the Transfer Elastic
Net effectively works. Furthermore, we examine situations where it exhibits the
grouping effect, which states that the estimates corresponding to highly
correlated predictors have a small difference.
